channel.title: CVE Feed for LibOFX -- LibOfx
channel.description: The latest CVEs for LibOFX -- LibOfx

item.title: CVE-2017-2816|2024-09-17T00:11:42.495Z -- libofx -- libofx
item.description: An exploitable buffer overflow vulnerability exists in the tag parsing functionality of LibOFX 0.9.11. A specially crafted OFX file can cause a write out of bounds resulting in a buffer overflow on the stack. An attacker can construct a malicious OFX file to trigger this vulnerability.
